is a fan favourite character for reasons that either work with people or dont for me is a fun character for his complete insanity oneliners and other such things that im sure others may find annoying however doing a movie on this character would be a little tricky but not impossible for me while the character is pretty much spot on there are a few things that drag itthe plot is that wade wilson is a mercenary who after finding the girl of his dreams and having a relationship that eventually leads to an engagement things however take a really dark turn when wade is diagnosed with cancer someone manages to find him and offer him the chance to have his cancer cured with sciencey things he is injected with the mutant gene by someone named ajax and put to various forms of torture one works but permanently damages his skin he breaks out after a weekend of the form of torture that did this and pretty much makes him more indestructible then wolverine going back to his hometown he tries to get back with his girlfriend but decides not to go through with it because of the issues he has with image he decides to suit up and start killing off everyone who was involved in order to get to ajax or francisonto what i didnt like the fourth wall jokes are something everyone in the opening credits is credited down as something like written by the real heroes here or directed by an overpaid tool there are other things like throwing a toy of weapon xi from xmen origins wolverine saying he hates it or him saying please dont make the supersuit green or animated there are quite a few of them but theyre not even chuckleworthy the rest of them are good but these just stand out for being badoh and the nonlinear structure frustrated me the movie starts with in costume shooting up cars and causing massive highway damage then it cuts to his past then it cuts to the highway damage then it cuts to his past then more highway damage you may have already seen it in the trailer a lot because to tell all of that one action scene takes the movie an entire hour i get theyre trying to balance out the whole i have cancer thing with some of what makes because honestly having this be a cancer drama for the first half would be weird when for the time hes a superhero hes foulmouthed oneliner cracking shooting stabbing and all of that would probably have audiences think theyre in a completely different movie but couldnt they have more action scenes then just that one thats where my complaint liesas a side note stuff here are other things i dont believe wade and vanessa are in love throughout the movie considering thats the only dramatic plot line towards the end thats a huge problem i have no idea of the purpose of the roommate has because all she does in the entire length of the movie is give him guns and speaking of i dont like the cab driver character popping up for the second time he wasnt really that funny in the first scene he was in either the funniest part of that scene was the thought of using a taxi whether its from the angle of accepting a heavily armed weirdos request to get in or comparing it to other superheroes means of transportationonto what i liked well for those like me that thought ryan reynolds as was a miscasting in xmen wolverine be pleasantly surprised the oneliners are pretty funny whether its from or some of the other characters i will say it unlike some of the superhero movies that get praised made today  was able to keep my attention from beginning to end so while i have ripped into this movie a bit i will say its probably one of the better superhero movies made today oh and i havent read that much of the comics for a while but everyone seems to be perfectly cast in their roles id say that if what youre looking for is a very good comedyaction movie then i would suggest this but not walk in with the expectation that it maybe something moreid say watch it but it to me is nowhere near as good as the almost 90 rating it currently has id say that it is worthwhile its probably more worthwhile then anything else on ill say it is instant redemption for another representation of the character made 7 years ago although does anyone aside from comic book fans really remember that aside from extreme hugh jackman fans and for that i think it unequivocally proves that they know how to represent the character at least now anyway

the roots of this film were very convoluted werent they 20th century fox had overseen a literally butchered version of back in xmen origins wolverine sew shut the wisecracking merc with a mouths sasshole really and reynolds himself didnt do so well with green lantern either from what ive read it seems like fox themselves didnt have much faith in the idea of a proper outing so reynolds and co had to lobby like crazy for years to get this thing made only to have several million slashed from the budget late into project fox have a history of derailing projects so its to be expected baccarin was previously involved in cult favourite firefly which had similar things happen so shed know better than anyone and it does lead to a wonderful bitingthehand joke where they ask why xaviers mansion is so huge when theres only two xmen in the story but i digressdespite these many speed bumps delays and other issues the movie succeeds on a number of levels  story acting directing humour  all present and correct and it hits the target so consistently you cant help but wonder what all the fuss was aboutmy favourite ryan reynolds character before this was the overgrown college boy van wilder and here he channels that sense of manic energy and fasttalking perfectly into wade wilson amping it up further when the famous red and black suit goes on the guy cant help but crack wise at every opportunity even when hes putting his last 12 bullets into the perps hes still mocking them to amuse himself me personally i found this hilarious throughout the whole film almost all the jokes work theres maybe three or four amongst the hundreds of puns putdowns and pop culture references that miss so im clocking that as maybe 3 that didnt make me smile laugh or groan at the right times  that for me is a high hit rate and a sign of great writingmore than just being a comedy though i was surprised to find that the love story between reynolds and baccarin is actually pretty compelling i figured maybe itd be thrown in to link with the valentines day release but no this has proper roots in the story the chemistry between the two leads is clear to see  they obviously enjoyed working together on thisi suppose whats also quite exciting is that isnt yet another bloodless cuss free fun for all the family superhero flick either theres actually a reasonable amount of gore where appropriate which is something the others just dont have and bad languagevulgar jokes at every turn this makes it a little shocking in a good way because a thats what the character needs and b when youre used to every super flick being cleaned up to earn a uk pg rating the one that doesnt has more dramahumour as a result a sign that it was clearly targeted at an adult audience people have voted with their wallets so the sequel and potentially other superhero franchises too wed hope should continue this trend himself is an interesting complex character who is more of an antihero but not in the same broody way batman is hes too fun and silly for that so theres definitely a place for this style of filmthe origin story is told very skillfully i wouldnt have guessed that it was tim millers first effort as a film director due to the careful use of camera tricks and attention paid to the editing to show us how came to be through flashbacks that are never short and vague or long and boring the pacing keeps the energy up to the point where theres never a dull moment and the action scenes never overshadow the drama of the others its quite impressive as another reviewer noted at points it feels like a comic book has flown off the page and come to life and i cant say that about any other superhero movie ive seen so far even the top quality joss whedon avengers monolithsi would say i went into this movie with reasonable expectations and found them exceeded at every turn is a hugely entertaining character the other leads are well chosen i love negasonic teenage warhead as the careful jab at teenage cynicism the main villain is a little underdeveloped perhaps but thats a minor criticism when the movie overall has such great enthusiasm and is just hugely entertaining from the first frame to the last even the credits animations and closing stinger another quality pop culture pull spot the john hughes film reference reflect the tone perfectlythis movie truly is the redemption of ryan reynolds its the movie he worked hard for and he has not wasted the opportunity  a strong introduction to what we hope will become one of marvels best and most popular superhero movie franchiseswould i see this again absolutely i want to try and work out exactly what wade was doing with that stuffed unicorn for one thing

in what may become the surprise of the year if not the last few years may also change the way comic book films are made this film broke many boundaries and is a risky movie it broke the fourth wall and is not a film for kids as comic book films tend to generate towards this may also be the funniest comic book film ever literally every 5 minutes the crowd in the theater was laughing at the over the top puns and references the next thing to talk about is ryan reynolds in what may be his best role to date he is perfectly casted as no one else can pull this role off like he did as for everyone else they were forgettable and thats all im going to say about it other then that this film is worth checking out now to grade acting b music b characters a specialvisual effects a directing a overall a

ryan reynolds has been trying his hand at super hero film for a while nowwith varying degrees of success not totally his fault but i have to take my hat off to him for this time the amount of effort alone to get this film made right and market it deserves all the kudosthe film is great if you dont understand you might think this film on the immature silly sideit is but that is that i love who cares if the story is simple or silly this film is fun from start to finish so if your going to watch leave your adult pants at the door and just enjoy the outrageous puns the flamboyant deaths gratuitous swearing its just deadpoolread the comic or play the gameyou will understand

is a fantastic movie with a really well developed plot and an outstanding comedic cast that are also very much able to be dramatic when its necessary its a marvel movie connected with the xmen series but it is so very different not just from superhero films but from any other movie out there its funny it has a surprising amount of heart its action packed and extremely violent they certainly took advantage of the r rating the best part about the movie is undeniably the main character and his ability to break the fourth wall we have seen it before but never to a degree as extreme as this he interacts with the audience makes reference to the movies cast the low budget its a terrific device that makes such a fun lovable character the only problem i really had with the movie is that the characters origins are overdeveloped it drags on for a long time showing us how he met his love interest and how he became immortal it was necessary but it did not need to be as detailed as it was the cast is all around terrific all entirely understanding of the blunt humour of this series ryan reynolds shines in the lead role of course as hes been trying to get this movie off the ground for years and his passion for the character is very evident he is also joined by the likes of morenna baccarin tj miller stefan kapicic and ed skrein who all did a stellar job with their vital roles great fun from start to finish intense violent and absolutely hilarious is easily of the best certainly the funniest superhero movies out there i would recommend it to anyone looking for a good action or comedy after an evil organisation kidnaps his girlfriend its up to wade wilson a man who has gained immortal powers and given the superhero persona of to save her best performance ryan reynolds

first i had never heard of in the comics so i had no idea what to expect saw the trailers and thought it looked interesting and decided to take a shot and see itbefore you consider watching this movie  keep in mind that it is irreverent to marvel very violent has nonstop profanity way over the top in everything it does and was one of the funniest movies i have seen in a long time the movie should never be taken seriously and the viewer should not expect realism  this is an action packed thrill ride that is also very funny  watch it for what it is and you will enjoy it is no batman thats for surethe movie wastes no time in bringing action into play and the sequences are choreographed very well if you are familiar with the comic version of i was told he talks to the reader and this is what he does several times throughout the movie  turns his head and talks to the audience  no super hero has ever done that beforeif you want to watch a high action movie with lots of violence language and hilarious one liners and insults then this is the movie for you do not bring your little kids to this filmi give this movie a 910 for its originality script brilliant action and irreverence toward marvel cannot believe marvel actually can laugh at itself for once this movie took a huge chance and it works  on almost every levelhighly recommend this film

this is my first review ever so please bear with me it had to be why you should watch is up to you but i am telling you your money and time will be worth it it is not like any superhero movie it has everything you want in a movie it is like a romantic comedy action packed gory film which will leave a mark in your brain and will send you home laughing your ass off it is r18 but i think kids can watch it too with adult supervision of course ryan reynolds was born to do this and i do not or cannot see anyone else do and the soundtrack is too cool for school that rhymed eh lol big shout out to the producers crew and the actors who made this movie one of the best movies ever made if you havent watched it what the hell are you waiting for

marvel comics unconventional superhero hits our big screen just before valentines day a life saver if you forgot that special day  so style it out and take your woman to the cinema if you want to kill two birds with one stone the first is that you can take your bird or loved one to see a movie that is a chick flick which has all the ingredients of a love story and the second is that you get see a dick flick that has all the ingredients of an action packed adventure as you would expect from a marvel comic moviethe ladies will love this cheesy  tongue in cheek humor with a dash of ahh in it and the male counterparts will be thankful that was macho enough to go with your bae and enjoy not only the movie but the fantastic soundtrack ryan reynolds who plays wadebrings this superhero to life with dignity in a dead end job as a mercenary wade falls in love with morena baccarin who plays vanessa dreaming of a better life with her until he is diagnosed with cancer he decides to leave her to give her the opportunity to live a better life without him and takes the help of ed skrein who plays ajax to cure his cancer and giving him super powers as he was a dead man walking so he had nothing to loosei must say for an overpaid director you have to see the opening credits  this movie is worth every barrel of laughter this anti superhero will have you laughing crying and squeegeeing all at the same time there are some scenes that are bloody and pretty gruesome but quickly followed by a snare remark to distract you from what you have just witnessed make sure you sit through the credits as the humor does not end until the very endi loved the soundtrack for from junkie xl mad max fury road has scored the movie to dmxs x gon give it to ya tracks from saltnpepa to neil sedaka and wham  who said romance is deadms safirah iranitwittersafirah63

ill be simple i loved this movie not only because it was really funny also because it had all the elements that it needed to be the perfect movie i dont give it a 1010 because of the origins story maybe too long and some plot holes here and there but the rest was pure perfection i havent seen a movie this good of only one superhero in marvel since captain america winter soldier considering only the 60 million of their budget this was surprisingly good the r rated helped a lot hope we could see more r rated movies of superherosthis movie took a lot of risks and it paid off crushing the box office in the oppening weekend making it in the top 30 of biggest oppening weekend in history all of the acting was perfect i liked all of them not a single person had bad acting hope 2 could be just as good as this one im totally going to watch this three or four times more hope hollywood keeps doing movies like this

a barrage of action and humor blend seamlessly providing an immensely entertaining experience the story features basic themes of love and revenge with wellpaced flashbacks to the origin of wade wilson as he becomes but is refreshingly unique and original both in and out of costume the star provides laughs is no typical movie adaptation of a comic book character its nowhere near familyfriendly like spiderman or the avengers this one is r rated and intended for mature viewers who enjoy extremely immature comedy in addition to over the top violence its not for kids except the ones with cool parents of course director tim miller strongly impresses in his first feature film the cgi effects are wellutilized and signature style of breaking the fourth wall is a frequent treat the plot and pacing provide a steady stream of fun the film has its clichs like any but makes fun of them to viewers as they occur turning anything generic into a laugh be prepared for a vulgar perverted and crude humor with overthetop violence if nudity or sex scenes offend you then beware the satirical humor can be dark and twisted similar to south park at its most extreme not all the comedic dialog lands flush but the creatively colorful dialog keeps the laughs coming ryan reynolds feels perfectly cast as the quickwitted antihero ed skrein stars as the antagonistvillain ajax although the character is a prototypical british baddie his back and forth with reynolds is great actor tj miller provides comedic support as the best friend weasle morena baccarin who plays the role of wilsons girlfriend vanessa impresses in a silly fun role in stark contrast to her work in homeland as he has another pair of supporting characters in the form of xmen colossus and negasonic teenage warhead the former is played by stefan kapicic and greg lasalle who split the work between voice and physical acting the latter who ill call ntw is brianna hildebrand who pulls it off well this movie is not for the easily offended and not to be taken seriously entertainment value is what counts and has it in droves disclaimer i am not responsible for the corruption of any innocent souls that may result from watching deadpool

the superhero movie has become stale as of late 2015 didnt do much for the genre as its most notable entry was avengers age of ultron which was a serviceable film at best the genre suffers because of its formulaic core marvel can make a billion dollars off of pretty much anything these days so they have little incentive to mix it up the mold has been perfected in terms of box office success and with it originality has taken a fatal blow however doesnt fit into this mold or any other for that matter and thats why its the best superhero movie to be released since guardians of the galaxy 2014 follows wade wilson played by ryan reynolds a mercenaryforhire that kicks the mess out of people for a living after being diagnosed with terminal cancer wilson signs on to an experimental program that will cure his cancer and allow him to happily live out his days with his girlfriend this program isnt what it seems however and wilson emerges from the torturous experimentation mutated disfigured and super powered with his newfound abilities wilson christens himself and goes on the path of revenge from the first frame of the opening credits its clear that is unlike every other superhero movie that came before it its hero isnt really much of a hero at all hes prone to profanity innuendo and brutal violence most of which is done with relative taste anyone whos been on the internet in the last month has surely seen some trace of the films pervasive marketing campaign most of which asserts the obnoxious humor characteristic of himself initially this worried me i was afraid id be subjected to several hours of lowbrow prepubescent humor and although there was certainly plenty of that strewn throughout it wasnt nearly as idiotic as i anticipated certainly not all of the ridiculous oneliners connect but a surprising number of them stick the landingin fact most of is genuinely hilarious the film is insanely selfaware and much like the comic books from which it came it often breaks the fourth wall addressing the audience directly just for the laughs it plays off the absurdity of its genres formula with refreshing effectiveness using the tired tropes of superhero flicks to its advantage however much of this breaks down into a matter of taste regardless for some people with be a humorless excursion into immaturity but for those unburdened by seriousness this film is a riot however violent it may be theres an honesty to be found amidst the carnage films like the avengers 2012 deal with apocalyptic destruction that surely leaves hundreds of thousands dead but the audience is never exposed to any of that weve seen iron man save the day countless times blasting his enemies to bits with his array of billiondollar technology but were never shown the reality of his actions sure he saved new york from an alien invasion but half the city was destroyed in the process almost all superhero movies deal in this kind of flashy softcore violenceon the other hand shows us exactly what its hero is all about wielding twin katanas wilson cuts through swathes of his enemies separating limb from torso head from spine and ego from spirit hes a killer like most superheroes but at least hes sincere about it characters like wolverine have power sets that are entirely based in visceral dismemberment and yet theyre dressed up on screen as if the kills are somehow clean and its title character are much more honestany complaints made about the films lack of plot or original characters are based in misunderstanding the villain for example is an intentional clich thats carefully crafted to reflect the tiresome habits of action movies everywhere right back into hollywoods face the plot is bare bones lacking in any globalscale destruction or international crises which is refreshing when considering the fact that the earth has come close to annihilation in nearly every other superhero movie knows precisely what its doing with its own elements its all very intentional its just a matter of whether or not you like its intentionbut this film has done more than provide us with an entertaining way to spend two hours has proved that theres a place for rrated superhero movies in todays market its taken what guardians of the galaxy started and expanded on it proving that the mold isnt the only way for studios to make money hopefully this films success will inspire future installments in the superhero genre to think outside the box

2016we can all agree that the topic of superheroes embodies a wide spectrum we have seen our flawed yet noble heroes iron man antman thor and we have also seen our dark gritty rougharoundtheedges antiheroes batman and wolverine and then we havedeadpoolthis is a somewhat different sort of heroic character who cannot fall into any particular category as he consistently breaks free from such standard bonds and rules this would possibly be quite difficult to lay out cleanly for general audiences to fully grasp let alone enjoy but this movie without a doubt nailed itmuch like the title character rather than go with the standard storyline structure beginning middle and end this film takes you on a rollercoaster ride of ups and downs as we witness the genesis of the socalled merc with a mouth the films starts us off in the middle with wild crazy and even hilarious action sequencesgoes back to our heros humble beginningsback to the crazy funny rising action middlethe compelling beginnings againthen back to the middle allowing us to better comprehend and even appreciate why is the way he is it should be of no surprise to us moviegoers that this is not an appropriatefor children superhero movie even if you dont know anything about the character the trailers movie posters and teasers wouldve been clues enough for mature adult superhero fans this movie really does have it all action rude language gratuitous violence crude humor sexuality a compelling story and most important of allentertainment of course it can be argued that the story seems simplistic in its telling a wronged protagonist seeking out revenge in the name of love etc etc but what more does a superhero origin story really require most superhero movies these days become royally screwed what with their overly convoluted story lines multiple villains popping out of the woodworks and even unnecessary visual effects all the while expecting the audiences to take the plot seriously and just go with it ie the amazing spider man 2 works so well as a movie simply because the audience knows rightoffthe bat that it is not meant to be taken seriously the opening credits are proof enough of that the title character actually takes us on this personal ride of his talks to us and literally expresses how ridiculous the whole situation really is take note this is exactly what as a character is meant to be and do granting the movie major points for loyalty to source material however when all is said and done this film wouldve been impossible to make without ryan reynolds the heart and soul of the whole project people tend to throw the term perfect casting around a lot but in this particular case there was truly no one better to play the role of reynolds was born for this role he perfectly embodied the characters vulgar and charmingly sarcastic nature in fact it would be fair to say that the films wellshot and seamlessly choreographed fight sequences made up about 10 of what made the movie so great the other 90 was pure raw attitude all of it originating from ryan reynolds himself all in all this was a fantastic movie great for all to enjoy providing they are mature enough to handle all of the wild generally inappropriate shenanigans it had to offer speaking for the fans we cant wait to see what else will have in store in the future

finally a film that met and exceeded my expectations not for kids hilarious and action packed from credits to post credits scene innovative in the way it gives us the origin story and fabulous in the breaking of the 4th wall reynolds is the natural choice for our hero the supporting cast is strong and the writing and direction are spot on the special effects were grand yet understated the villain was not run of the mill nor over the top the story stayed true to the source as well as it possibly could this is one film that could have been longer but id rather be left wanting more than to have dry spots well done gang bring on the sequels i hope this opens the door for more r rated comic book films theyre not just for kids kudos

this film never takes it self too seriously which could have wound up being to its detriment however in this vein this is exactly how the movie thrives i found to be funny and a bad ass in equal parts this could prove to be a tough balance but reynolds pulls it off the action sequences are killer especially in imax as i saw them rarely if ever does this film lose momentum and is always engaging merging sarcasm charisma and brutal fighting skills the anti superhero keeps us guessing and on the edge of our seats its a thrill ride you wont wanna get off of i gotta give honorable mention to ed skrein as ajax really thought he was brilliant in this role

now as this is my first review i may be a bit rough around the edges but j felt so strongly about this subject matter i felt i needed to at least put my voice out there and add my two cents to the mix firstly anyone who sees this will laugh there isnt a joke on any level both crass and base or high brow that wont raise at least a giggle ive been following since his 1997 comic run until the early 2000s and this movie follows along some of these parallels and it does them well while still in keeping with its own thing secondly ryan reynolds is a huge fan of the character and it shows in every way every line every frame every movement bryan singer who created the movie world of the xmen should watch this and hang his head in shame not full of allegories of homosexuality and discrimination with a few fights and comic names thrown into the mix to make you think oh its an xmen movie no this is the real deal theres only 2 count them 2 xmen at all in the movie and not only does the film get one spot on colossus but the other is actually improved upon and given real character and a sure on fan base for the future yes there are some details wrong and i could pick apart every small issue like the emotional scenes arent as good as they could be or the villains not really fleshed out hell even tj miller could have used more screen time he was perfect in this really from start to finish it is what it says on the tin its a labor of love and it shows unlike those other xmen movies not including the most recent ones right from the choice of music and the little in jokes like fighting over ikea furniture of all things is hilariously glorious as also the point of do not bring kids to see this a family left the movie theater shortly after the film started and i do wonder the logic of parents just because he appeared in ultimate spiderman does not mean this is for kids far from it pick up the comics see the movie and i am sure youll be a fan yet lets hope and pray xmen apocalypse even comes close to this also yes end credits scene so stick around true believers

i just came back from saw it 23 hours ago it was a good movie and i had really a lot of fun but its premise was too simple for me a hero is born his love is kidnapped he saves her from the villain obviously it twisted that format and made it its own and the jokes were spot on but yet i felt it had something missing having read the comics the 4th wall breaking felt really not good to me i did loved the side characters especially colossus and dopindar the indian guy the romance was unique for a superhero movie and i loved it ryan renolds was born to play and i am very excited for the sequel now that the origin story is out of the way which is boring most of the times in conclusion i had a lot of fun however it did not impact me in any way and i will forget it in 23 days completely

time to own up im a comicbook fan and also massive nerd if my review is slightly excited i apologise this film nearly didnt happen isnt a conventional hero by a long way hes not even a hero the characters traits he shows make him something that hollywood feared making because they thought it wouldnt sell and feared it would be a legal nightmare  let alone the difficulties anticipated getting clearance by the censors leaked test footage in 2012  2014 combined with fan power gave this project wheels and the film is enjoyable to both fans and newcomers it helped that reynolds was such a fan of comics too he championed the conversion from comic to film from 2005 on social media directed by tim miller this comes out exactly 25 years after first appearance in marvel new mutants 98 in one comic i read writers joked at reynolds to star as if ever a film was made  granted there was one story arc where gained tom cruises face but thats a whole different story and it was always suggested reynolds was the man for the job here we are in 2016 and that joke is reality as ryan reynolds delivers a great performance as the merc with a mouth he does much better job here than in his previous incarnation of the assassin in the xmen origins wolverine movie and so much better than he does as the green lantern which is even joked about within this film relatively true to the comics the cast portray the characters in the world with tj miller playing weasel and leslie uggams as blind al amongst others even hydra bob makes an appearance its an origins story showing how wade wilson aka gets his regenerative powers and what he had to go through to save his lover vanessa played by morena baccarin from ajax ed skrein the action and humour in the film starts from the very moment the marvel badge dissolves from screen and there is a great pace for the duration of the film all the way through the film and passed the end credits you certainly get value for your tickets lots of camera and editing techniques used throughout to give the film a great look and feel both modern with classic techniques too while the main story unfolds flashbacks and flashforwards act as additional narration to help the audience learn about the antiheros journey i enjoyed the ride and that surprised me being such a fan i expected hollywood to ruin this film this doubt was further reserved with all the great reviews that were coming in since the film was released i really didnt want to be disappointed and i wasnt here i am after the film writing a review to confirm that i actually liked it a damn lot the acting is convincing the script is littered with humour and drama which worked well with the expected insanity and violence which was due as well as the humour in the script there were visual jokes hidden in a beautiful crafted world typically broke the 4th wall with the character as well his surroundings talking to the audience there were jokes and nods to the previous character to feature a the below par xmen origins  wolverine movie like the action figure and the suggestion of sewing wilsons mouth shut a green lantern another role played by reynolds card was seen and wilson even begs not to get a green or animated suit while being treated by the weapon x programme talking to the camera refers to the previous xmen films and asks colossus if stewart or mcavoy was the current professor at the institute and at one point the merc even breaks the 16th wall by talking to the audience in a flashback already talking to the audience  typical insanity if you are familiar with youll already be aware of him constantly breaking the 4th wall and youll no doubt be aware that he got his merc with a mouth nickname due to his constant talking and wise cracking the film portrays that really well without ever getting confusing or boring sometimes the joke may not land but thats ok its and he cant help himself the minor negatives in the film for me and let me be clear these are teeny tiny negatives and didnt ruin the film for me were colossus and ajax i could have happily seen a different xman rather than the metal russian i imagine the cgi to create colossus wasnt easy and maybe a simpler character could have fitted the film better  although the fight scene with on the bridge was really amusing ajax was a little forgettable and judging by the villains that has fought in the comics filmmakers could have opted for somebody else  but then it wouldnt necessarily be an origins based film i enjoyed this although i didnt think the film was as bat sht crazy as it could have been it actually had as much of a heart as it did blood shed i enjoyed it more than other movies in the marvel universe the film doesnt take itself seriously and in doing so has a great mix of emotions at different times combine that with great action and you have a top notch film thats well worthy of a 9 out of 10 from me i was more content than i thought i would be being an established fan and an over critical one at that if you want a crude rude hard paced film with lots of bloodshed action but with a soft romantic side step up and buy a ticket in fact buy two or three tickets to help fund a follow up movie which might have cable and or nick fury in it

the most anticipated movie of 2016 has arrived and i was much eager like the other audiences to go for it i watched the movie in imax as i had high hopes with it the movie was astonishing with a tangled love story and a revenge saga was intense funny violent enough to make the audiences go for it a well made story and good character played by ryan reynolds brings reynolds back again after a series of failures action were timed very well and jokes in between the scenes were funny too i got what i expected from and marvels continues to surprise with new projects i go with 45 for and everyone should enjoy their valentines day watching deadpool

so finally seen the movie i have been waiting ages to see i was first was introduced to around 4 or 5 years ago by my older brother i read a few comics over the years and i was hooked and he is my second favourite marvel hero first being wolverine but i will say that in movie form comes first he would probably say that to ha haon to the movie i found it very well executed i loved the opening credits simply because its all about tongue and cheek and not taking it seriously the action sequences were really great to watch really over the top same goes for the jokes i couldnt stop laughing the bit with the hand growing back had me nearly in tears with laughter and the orgins wolverine toy was a nice touchi will say though that the story was a bit lacking and the villain was done poorly but not to enough to spoil the moviethe introduction of colossus and warhead was great i liked the new version of colossus really looks from the comics i would say this anyone who does not know the character and wants to see this movie go and research on him and then see how you feel about going to see the movie and always go with an open mind

confession i have a very limited comic book experience i just learn about these marvel or dc characters from either my 17yearold uncle or my knowledge from traditional comicbook movies and animated tv shows the best comicbook movies i always connected with the most are the xmen saga ive been a fan ever since the first movie directed by bryan singer came out 16 years ago currently waiting for xmen apocalypse to come out this memorial day but this is quite new to me when i heard that there is a movie actually happening last time i heard about i first saw him in xmen origins wolverine which i liked but it was the rotten apple of the series he was of course played by ryan reynolds who made the most of his very small role until see the movie or not and see why all of us were so disappointed anyway me being the reluctant one i didnt think a movie would work guess what its the one all of us comic book or noncomicbook nerds are waiting for so why did i warm up to well for one thing this guy who dresses up in a red suit is the kind of hero we havent seen in a while a man who shoots first and says a few wiseass things after that hes also known to break all types of walls first second third fourth and im pretty sure theres a fifth one and he doesnt give a bleep about everything as played by reynolds he seems to be the perfect choice for an rrated and unbelievably unconventional marvel character so how does this movie work well it starts off with the ridiculously inventive opening titles done in way plus a killer action sequence on a highway then its the origin story of which is quite a surprising one we get to meet wade t wilson reynolds also known as the merc with the mouth and maximum brute force he also finds his pretty woman see what i did there in vanessa morena baccarin from spy gotham and homeland there is a massive flaw in this system in which he has cancer making sure he doesnt lose her he signs for a experiment that should help him be cured of cancer turns out poor wade made a deal with the devil or in this case ajax a stunning ed skrein who is obviously a doppelganger for nicholas hoult also known as beast from the xmen series for an experiment that goes horribly wrong leaving his whole body scarred now all wade needs to do is get revenge on ajax and once he puts on the outfit its all good to go but standing in his way though are two members of the xmen colossus stefan kapicic and negasonic teenage warhead feisty brianna hildebrand is and has to be the best r rated unconventional superhero movie of its kind since the original kickass it has the right to make fun of the superhero genre and be super cheeky clever dark funny and incredibly bloody it even wears its heart and the rrating on its sleeve for example theres a sex scene with and vanessa set to neil sedakas calendar girl that pushes the boundaries to anything ive ever seen plus the bone breaking bloodspurting action is about as inventive as one could possibly ask for plus also has a tendency to talk smack about everything from the studio thats releasing the film to the xmen to wolverine and the actor playing him and even the actor thats playing although i wasnt a fan of van wilder and i only warmed to him when he was in great movies like definitely maybe the proposal smokin aces and the changeup i like ryan reynolds and hes very good here scratch the very good hes electric in the role of his foulmouthed fastpaced and earnest deliveries of certain lines are sure to be quite memorable and even though there are times when we just want him to shut up you cant put him down because we like and we certainly want him to get the girl hes also helped by a really cool cast including morena baccarin who provides the heart and soul of gold in the love story part tj miller who i also like is pitchperfect as the comic relief in terms not mine weasel leslie uggams as uncle al who is wise blind and caring not in the traditional sense and mma fighter turned movie star gina carano is lethally badass as angel dust who is more stronger than mr pool and colossus all combined props has to go to firsttime director tim miller from the world of visual effects and screenwriters rhett reese  paul wernick of zombieland for letting this animal go loose in wild big and cool ways that breaks the usual types of stuff we usually see in most superhero movies and for giving reynolds an opportunity to get comically crazy and go out blazing with a high chord like he always does is actually the first movie of 2016 that unabashedly lives up to the hype mainly because we werent expecting something quite like this i dont know if we will have something like this again but hey at least it was awesome right youll have a blast trust me and bring some chimichangas while youre at it its the perfect and most twisted valentines day gift youll give to your significant other oh and one more thing this movie is not for the faint of heart the squeamish and certainly not for kids

an r rated super hero movie our prayers have been answeredthat is because the people at 20th century fox home of the xmen franchise have decided to kick things up a notch and then kick them sideways in the process theyve given us a super hero movie heavy with violence very very vulgar language and sexual situations in short every thing the spider man movies were not we get a movie with attitude to spare right from the opening credits which is a joke too good to spoil give the writers rob liefield and fabian nicieza along with director tim miller great credit they get the marvel character of right and then some perfectly capturing the merc with the mouth weve all come to know in the comic book one the best things about this movie as that it does not try and do too much giving a compact origin and revenge story without shoehorning in too many other marvel universe characters from the xmen books unlike spidey superman and batman does not have a legendary origin story for screenwriters ruin by tweaking it for the big screen we just get douche bag wade wilson diagnosed with terminal cancer and then mutated by risky treatment run by ajax aka francis the villain of the piece whose only motive is to create super powered slaves wade his body now a mass of scare tissue courtesy of ajax fashions the now familiar red spandex costume adopts the name and goes to get some payback a simple plot that makes sense unlike some other comic book franchises that believe big is betterfinally gives ryan reynolds a part truly equal to his talent and should make him the super star he should have become a decade ago hes been a dependable actor in romcoms and bad comedies while often proving himself a very capable action hero is makes good use of his physical attributes and great comic timing the jokes and one liners he gets off are funny enough on the page but coming out of reynolds mouth is what really makes them funny and proving he is a very good sport the script takes very funny pokes at green lantern and blade iithere is a good supporting cast starting with tj miller whose character should simply be called comic relief ed skrein makes for a good bad guy with requisite british accent morina baccarin is wades tough talking girlfriend a love interest most worthy of the hero stefan kapicic is the colossus weve known from the xbooks while briana hildenbrandt is his sidekick teenage nagasonic warhead leslie uggams turns up in a small but very funny part as the blind woman rooms with a one point karin soni is quite funny as cabbie who chauffeurs heroes to a couple of big showdowns stan lee has his gratuitous cameo but it really is one of the funnier onesthe man is a great sportthe violence is bloody and the there is a car chase that doesnt look like every one weve ever seen in a movie before many of the jokes are very dirty and in really bad tasteway beyond anything heard on family guy some of them will make you laugh just because of how awful they arenobody who sees this movie will never again not giggle at the mention of meredith baxter birneyand there is a great soundtrack featuring chicago and neil sedaka among othersthough this is a super hero movie its not one for the kids and its raunchy attitude breaks new ground for the super hero genre lets hope the guys over at disneymarvel are paying attention

as a loyal comic book fan i found this a pleasant change from all the recent pg kiddie films the action scenes are spectacular the humor is adult and mature visuals are also stunning and good for its budgetis at his best that being said certainly sets the bar higher for future comic book films the character is fully utilized and is a direct translation from his comic book counter partryan reynolds does a superb job as the merc with a mouth and delivers on all aspects watch out avengers theres a new hero in town and he aint playing a must watch for any person who wants a dark mature comic book hero

is a movie directed by tim miller and written by rhett reese and paul wernick it stars ryan reynolds ed skrein morena baccarin and tj miller along with karan soni brianna hildebrand and stefan kapicica former special forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers adopting the alter ego deadpooli didnt like i didnt love i adored to me is the height of marvel entertainment as it keeps the essence of the iconic character while weaving together a thoroughly engrossing storythis movies story has everything needed to build a pop cultural masterwork it finds its heart and originality in in its vulgarity and hubris much like its main character this sets it apart from any other superhuman movie ever movie at least in my opinion this is thanks in large part to the snark and acid wit demonstrated by the writers or the true heroes of this storythough decidedly scattershot and a tad bit convoluted writers over come these minor hiccups with mighty style showcasing their ferocious flair ready and willing to please these two fine men manage craft a movie that has both humor and depth a feat like no otherthough the wit self reference genre subversion and fourth wall breaks demonstrated in this movie did impress me the one facet that really sealed the deal as wade would say perhaps in a different context for me was the love story in most if not all actioncomedies there is a romance in most if not all actioncomedies the romance falls flat and seems overly clichd this is not the case as vanessa and wades romance feels earned thoroughly sweet and really fleshes out the characters leading to some seriously tense and emotional scenes in a movie that utilizes the phrase less angry rosie odonnellthe credibility of the love story and the nonstop humor behind it is only furthered by the two dedicated performers ryan reynolds and morena baccarin who display their seamless chemistry marvelouslyanother attribute that seemed thoroughly seamless was the pace of this movie constantly speeding but never exhausting tim miller manages to create perfect shot after perfect shot never overusing certain techniques and avoiding altogether dreadful uses of shaky cam and other equally annoying and lazy techniques first time directors often use tim miller proved to filmgoers everywhere that he has a long and prolific career ahead of him through this movie ryan reynolds has finally proved that he too has a long and prolific career ahead of him dawning the challenging role of the iconic and universally loved reynolds offers his best work to date bringing his trademark charm and enthusiasm to the profane merc with a mouth he is truly the shining star of this glimmering mess he played the role so well i really cant think of anyone else to play the part a feat only previously achieved by a handful of talented actors he fit so snugly into the part that i can really see a possible globe win for him in the already planned sequelaccompanying reynolds morena baccarin delivers a surprisingly heartfelt turn as wades love interest vanessa far from elementary baccarin brings out the complex emotional states of her character and reynolds ed skrein was really the only wild card in the lot as i wasnt sure how original they could make the evil british villain clich luckily for the transporterrefueled star he was given a genuinely decent role as the perpetual thorn in our outlandish heros sideoverall i can confidently say that has quickly become my second favorite comic book ever made barely lacking behind the dark knight gets an a or a 1010

when watching it is not exactly the typical marvel movie since it had lots if cursing blood fourth wall references and nudity which doesnt really bother me but it feels different ryan reynolds returns as the chatter box wade wilson who manages to charm himself with his witty humor and given the chance to explore hid origins wade is a mercenary that falls in love with a hooked named vanessa but finds out the tragic news that he has cancer and goes to francis as a way of fibbing a cure for his illness while he does findeed a cure for his condition but it also mutates him one of the aspects i liked was giving colissus a decent role who has been underused in the x men films

by far the hardest that ive ever laughed in a theatre the movie does have a weak plot and the villains could be better but that doesnt affect my rating much because the movie made up for it by doing everything that they did do perfectly i give it a 9710 but ill just round it up to 10 i highly recommend the movie but you probably wont like it if you are sensitive to violence  i also would not recommend it to children although it was not as vulgar as a film as i anticipatedit is still definitely for an adult audience everyone in my theatre applauded the film afterwards including me im just rambling because i loved this movie so much but i should probably sum things up it was hilarious action packed fun and without a doubt deadpool

this movie reminds me of a million ways to die in the west which also fails to be funny but in a different way in their only way of being funny is to throw lame contextless jokes one after another watching the movie is like watching a standup comedian show a talentless one of coursethe action part of this movie fails also lots of action and violence but none of them enjoyable it is so messy and chaotic that it is as if the action scenes are not be directed at all and the actors just improvise with minimum effortawful just awful

superb movie must watch this is what a superhero should be fun is from start till the end ryan reynolds is at his best morena does great job too direction was terrific but the story was not at its best right from the start when introduces us to what is there to see in the movie leading to an awesome and one of the best action sequence i have seen in the movie his punching dialogues and high octane action is the real hero in this movie the movie delivers what was promised there is action there is love there is revenge there is emotions honestly i had never heard of before i saw this movie after seeing it i had to find out more about him as i loved him now i cant wait to see a sequel

i guess the reason its so easy to divinate is that his self destruction the normal humans deathdrive alike as explained by psychoanalysis actually drives him toward greatness immortality even  this is what were often driven to believe in our lives as well besides immortality guys i hope no one is so naiveonly when reality kicks in we tend to stop regain control get back to our terms realize that these selfdestructive processes we put ourselves through as coping mechanisms might actually lead to perishing of our existence on the most basic level who doesnt like to get trashed of alcohol on a saturday night for that matterthis is where humor kicks in as another tool of success for this impeccable story to help us cope with the inabilities that we face and fail to overcome especially psychologically well not exactly the same inabilities but hey might be immortal now but his faces ugly as life that he now has to live forever so we aint the only ones with problemsvery captivating film without this pretentious effort of other superhero movies but still full of glittery artifice and shinny cgi no wonder a lot of people might be hardly waiting for the second part and who knows how many more

confusing title  i know but i peed my pants laughing so hard that i felt like i shouldve watched it whilst sitting on the toilet normally what one can expect from a movie is a shitty love story because thats what people like apparently a happy ending and some kind of evil villain who will ultimately be destroyed or whatever and of course lots of action and killing this movie combined all those annoying features into the most genius innovative and eyeopening movie of all times for once we as watchers are presented with a righteous killer you know its true on a path of legit destruction who is not afraid of spilling blood ridiculing everything and everyone whenever he can kudos to ryan reynolds and wherever he can bravo marvel for making 2016 just a slightly bit better

there is always a guilty pleasure film every year that creeps into my favourites and in 2016 it is no other than which takes the comic hero genre to another level of funny where even the guardians of the galaxy could not reach this one is not about the action scenes which there were in good doses of or even gory ones which there were plenty of but more so about the little details of an excellent score including music from wham the amazing funny and borderline rude one liners including a ton of inmovie jokes and in general the entire selfsarcastic nature of it in fact and regardless of the admittedly very thin plot it was so much fun that i had to watch it twice

is a must see movieryan reynolds was brilliant throughout if you are looking for action humour and some good music this movie has it allthere was never a dull moment and the superb writing and production combined with reynolds timing and delivery made for many moments of really laughing out loudthis movie doesnt take the same serious approach as other super hero action movies the central character is refreshingly flawed and likable for it the movie was very well made on all levels its production values are as good as any of the blockbuster movies out therei was totally entertained from start to finish

once upon a time there was a film studio that was living a dream every film they came out with was a major superhero blockbuster everybody loved their films but there comes a time when things begin to saturate a time when glories of the past are casting a shadow upon everything the future will bring yes marvel cinematic universe im talking about you were getting tired of the endless machine invasions that may cause the end of the world were sick of the superheroes that are trying to break the status quo and then they reinvented themselves they regained our attention they brought us deadpoolryan reynolds is the alter ego of wade wilson a former special forces operative wade got involved in a rogue experiment that gave him accelerated healing powers this might seem great but he had to pay a price his skin transformed into scar tissue and to be honest it doesnt look really nice so wade wilson starts his journey of vengeance to find ajax ed skrein the man who did this to him so he can finally come back to his beloved girlfriend vanessa morena baccarin the title may ring a bell weve already met the antihero in one of marvels many franchises the xmen yet we need to forget all we learned about in xmen origins wolverine 2009 the old is nothing in comparison with the new one new isnt only as bloody as his former self but on top of that he is bloody hilariousyou could think that its easy for marvel hey were going to make a new franchise out of an old one just take some characters from the other film write a sequel story steal some ideas from the comic books and were done but no they didnt tehy brought up a lot of new stuff things we hadnt already seen in the comics the writers gave us an rrated film made of a violent and unflinching action sequences packed with crude and twisted humor with a lovely romantic touch and just to give it an extra dimension the whole film feels like wade wilson has written and directed it himself this is very comic accuratethats where the main characteristic of comes up his favorite hobby is breaking the fourth wall while watching the film you can catch yourself thinking about certain aspects of the film and then all of a sudden he turns his head looks into the camera and joins you on that train of thoughts another fourth wall breakingaspect knows that he is in a film he knows that ryan reynolds is doing a very good job in putting his character down this results in many references to other marvel films the actors previous achievements in other films and the acting skills of himself and his costars you could say that is almost reaching perfection the only thing that keeps it away from it is at the same time the thing that makes it so good the humor the many unpredictable jokes become rather predictable once youre halfway through the film the once surprising effect gets lostid say that if youre still doubting about seeing this film dont its really worth it its refreshing fun to watch hilarious sometimes touching and contains a lot of exciting action shots it also features two of wade wilsons colleagues among the xmen colossus stefan kapicic and negasonic teenage warhead brianna hildebrand and as would say while pointing a gun at your face what are you still doing here huh get the hell out of here and go watch the movie do we have deal huh

is a great movie the movie is very funny and entertaining and the action is amazing however the film is not perfect i have a couple of issues with it sometimes the cussing and dirty jokes can get tiresome or too much however it only got on my nerves once or twice during the film so it was not too much of an issue my only issue with the film is the origin while many of the origin parts are very entertaining once he gets to the place where he gets his powers i became very bored and was ready for it to return to the scenes however i think only ten minutes total was when i was bored so i definitely still really loved this film and maybe when i rewatch the film the origin wont bother me who knows the film is outstanding though ryan reynolds gives quite possibly the best male acting performance of the year as wade wilsonhe is he is absolutely amazing morena baccarin as vanessa was also great everyone in this film did a really good job the movie is very very funny there were probably only 14 jokes i didnt laugh out loud at the movie is great i dont think its the best of the year but it is definitely in my top 15 movies of the year i would give the movie a 910

though it has been hailed as an original and groundbreaking addition to the superhero universe i can call this only a step in the right direction yeah it was fun to see a movie that mocked some of the tropes of superhero movies but aside from that it was mostly lcd entertainment if nothing else it was not annoying in the way that superhero movies tend to be nobody was miraculously resurrected and the world was not at stake in any way which was nice i think mostly the creators felt like there should be a super movie that didnt have to cater itself to young audiences but if you really get down to it there is very little that is truly original about this movieas our antihero main goal is for the audience to have fun and basically love him even as he mutilates bodyguards and special ops left and right he certainly has a presence and personality always ready to pull out a sarcastic line regardless of his mood his relationship with vanessa was believable and not much more there are two main problems that i have with his character first he believes that vanessa will not want him back because of his ugliness this felt like a kind of oldfashioned sentiment that in other forms has been used in a number of fairy tales and fairy tale movies like the frog prince shrek second he has too much fun killing people now he does have a strong motive for fighting the people he does but his lighthearted mood in the action scenes is rather heartlessthe other characters dont get too much attention in fact they really dont exceed the stereotypes given to them in the opening credits francisajax is nothing special in terms of villains he just has a menacing presence and takes what wade wants colossus is the voice of good to wade but gets his advice mercilessly shot down vanessa may not be a multidimensional character but she at least has some personality and is not a dreamy airhead like many loveinterestsi was a little disappointed in the comedy that was included it was funny much of the time and a lot of the jokes felt original but there just could have been more i guess part of the problem was that some of the lines are only funny once and most of them were used in the trailers still there is a lot of variety in the style of humor which is a major plus and it is presented in entertaining ways i most enjoyed the budget jokes and colossus unfinished hero speech at the endif you hate superhero movies this will be fun for you to see but probably wont be all that you were hoping for if you like superhero movies youll still enjoy this and be able to laugh along with it for those of you who have doubts watch the first fifteen minutes and see what you think as i said i was a bit disappointed but if they come out with 2 i would be willing to see it overall rating 8110

its true to its comics and thats the best thing about this filmhowever the only thing that held this movie back was a lot of culture jokesits essential for people to understand the joke so you need to use references that majority of the world would knowand this wasnt the case for this movie a lot of jokes involved celebrities popular mostly in america thus i did not understand the jokes i understood most of them but imagine some less informedthe plot wasnt rushed nor too slowactors where fantasticmusic greatbut overall great movie

i have to admit that i am a huge fan of after reading the comics and trades i was excited when marvel announced that they were finally going to make a moviei had liked ryan reynolds as green lantern but when i found out that he was cast to play wade wilson the merc with a mouth i was one happy fangirl and i have to say he did not disappointmarvel had fun with this film all the characters were perfectly cast it was fun watching negasonic teenage warhead brianna hildebrand interacting with trading snark for snark while colossus stefan kapii as the voice of colossus is trying in vain to appeal to better saner side without success ajax and angel dust ed skrein and gina carano were good strong villains but it was leslie uggams as blind al that really stole the moviethe rest of the supporting cast played their roles well and created a good strong background for the main castit was also nice to see that marvel finally got character right for a change and i loved the fact that constantly breaking the fourth wall was included and a brief glimpse of bob popped up to the delight of the audiencethe movie was filled with chaotic images and kept up a frantic pace that suited the movie perfectly the constant tongueincheek references and humour kept the movie from becoming too darkall in all was a winner and i am looking forward to the sequel

so  a character which was butchered in xmen origins but here he is again taking the stage all by himselfits so funny explicit humorous and hit all the right chords of an r rated comedy about a hero who definitely kills more than villains firstly this movie works because of the freedom it received and without any intervention from anyone it does what it should do it makes you laugh filled with wierdly funny jokes and amazing action sequencesand ryan reylonds is absolutely amazingly fantastic where was he all those years ago his portrayal deserves him an oscar but academythis film from stating the films cast and title till the end credtis roll is a full on laughter ridei mean this is the film that makes fun of the x men timeline and states thats confusingthis is the one that points out that the xaviers mansion blows up in every x men moviei will not go further on the story though since you should watch it and be surprised but i can tell you every thing u loved or hated about a superhero movie is being laughed at in this flickgo and watch

i think is a great movie and i would rate it 10 out of 10 i say this because it has tons of humorous action in this film but also it shows you what different acts people can make towards trying to make its viewers laugheven though it may not be for younger audiences it shows you how life can turn from very good to crap but just because some medical things happen doesnt stop you from trying to change the world before your gonei think that if you enjoy comic book humor and kind of dirty minded films this is exactly for someone like you i enjoy it myself because it is kind of perverted yes but it has so much humor and it shows you how bad life can really be for some people these are some reasons of why i would rate a 10 out of 10 movie

a highly enjoyable balls to the wall comedy action flick that knows exactly what it is and never takes itself too seriously for me marvel comics has created many of the best and most watchable blockbusters on the market right now and this does not disappoint extremely sarcastic and willing to poke fun at other marvel characters and even the actors who play them which makes for a superb look at and his antihero mentality ryan reynolds is absolutely perfect for this role and simply no other actor could play this part with such ease and confidence the way ryan does jokes land and are laugh out loud the action sequences are excellently done with comedy even thrown in and the story keeps you thoroughly entertained throughoutoverall a completely unique and refreshing look at the hero genre and a mixture of original comedy action and good old bad ass fun

there rarely exists a time when i actually like a superhero movie but is an exception in the way that its different from most superhero moviesnow i tried not to join the hype train in fear of disappointment but fortunately i was not disappointed in the slightestapart from that has lived up to everyones expectations and most definitely has surpassed mine at first i thought it was going to be another bland superhero movie with little to no backstory of the main character but boy was i wrong surprisingly there was a enough of the story to make me feel emotionally attached to this characterand of course there are things being exploded balls being busted and above all awesomenessif your like potty jokes and awesomeness in general than what are you waiting for go watch it

deadpool2016 starring ryan reynolds morena baccarin gina carano tj miller ed skrein brianna hildebrand jed ress and karan soni directed by tim miller review you know i didnt think i was going to see this movie because while i may be eighteen i have no id but luckily my father took me man im glad cause this is one of the best superhero films just not the best rrated one based upon marvel comics most unconventional antihero tells the origin story of former special forces operative turned mercenary wade wilson who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers adopts the alter ego armed with his new abilities and a dark twisted sense of humor hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life this is a comic book that does not acknowledge itself but damn as heck feels like one with his balls out their humor and crazy costumed hero this movie was trying to get off the ground for years by ryan reynolds who felt he owed it to fans of the character to give them the they wanted after relentless backlash for both xmenorigins wolverine and his green lantern movie he damn well did owe us and he delivered it may be the most fun i have had in a comic book movie but that doesnt automatically make it the best but its one of the best not better than two films i could mention but the point is that you will fall in love with deadpool

the funniest nonclich and superior superhero movie ive ever seen as a character is unlike any hero youve ever seenhe has no qualms with blowing a bad guys head off with his pair of nine millimeter pistols or cutting them off with his twin katanas hes mixing it up with both the onscreen baddies and the audiencea superhero film is only as good as the actor playing him and if ever an actor was meant to play it is ryan reynoldsryan reynolds the king of charming smartness hits the big timebut its undeniably true that im in the minority here as reynolds has never been able to break through with audiences in a real or enduring way every effort to turn him into a legit action star has been met with stony silence if not open contempt

the new age of superhero movies shows how meta references and involving an expanding world of superheroes can create an entertaining flickisnt an average hero who has noble intentions or wants to save the world for the right reasons is in it for the revenge and to make something out of his worthless life i saw bravery and true potential from him in the start when he was willing to risk his life for a girl whos boyfriend wouldnt leave her alone most wouldnt care or get involvedhe undergoes experiments to transform his body into a super mutant but instead is betrayed by the mad scientist to become a slave while in not usually a fan of self aware films that pretend to be intelligent or witty yet this turned out to be a hidden gemryan reynolds has come along way from being a pretty face and a one note actor to be a leading man he brought heart and conviction to this rolethe xmen extras felt a little phony and not true to form of the characters we seen portrayed in the xmen series yet i found a certain appeal in their willfulness to risk livelihood and loved ones for the greater goodthe leading lady willing to over look psychical beauty for the man inside was touching she didnt care what anyone thought or how strange they looked in public you dont get depth like that in super hero movie or kickassstill it leaves the question on if is gay straight or bi since some of the action or phases he sprouts are questionable about his sexualitythe final fight scene was magnificent and kept you guessing will he save the girl or let her go to save mankind it was heartbreaking funny and touchingit earned all ten stars dont be put off commercials that dont do it justice

i understand it could of done better however loads of people rated this 1 star out of 10 have you frigging seen the opening credits that was awesome i mean starring gods perfect idiot that is awesome the cast was amazing the flashbacks were good and this film had some funny jokes if you are over the age of 15 and have not seen i assure you go and watch it this film was awesome tim miller ryan reynolds and much more help from loads of people made this film for a long time it was worth it colossus was amazing in this negasonic teenage warhead was brilliant and the damn british villain was outstanding i dont understand how anyone can really hate this this was a good success

ryan reynolds demeanor is perfect for this role the movie is an excellent blend of action humor and excitement it catches you from the start and holds your attention throughout the special effects are great the flow of the movie jumps around a bit but is done properly and conforms to the story references to the x men may suggest a possible merge of characters from this movie in the future i think that would be an amazing addition to the x men genre as it would bring the humor into that series however that would also have possible effect on the ratings or they would have to tone down the character in the movie or at least limit his appearances to avoid the crudeness and violence that would give it the r rating as the warnings have stated this is not for children

ok it was an origin story  again i dont know how many more super hero movies  especially origin stories  i can takebut this one killed it and for a couple different reasons first of all it was fun funny sexy and almost gratuitously violent hey im a north american movie watcher i like those as much as the next guy i found their approach to sexuality hilarious  one nice big montage get all that super steamy sex out of the way so that boom we can go back to the plot the violence was great  i thought they could have done more to establish the fact that wade wilson was a badass apexfighter pre healing factor or shown some training montages after his powers or something to justify his triplesowcow aerialmarksmen maneuvers lol and i thought the fight between him and francis at the end would have been more realistic if francis who had enhanced reflexes took less hits while wade with normal albeit peak reflexes just kept taking hit after hit but wearing francis down gradually aside from that though epic fighting and i loved itbut finally i think part of the reason it was a success was the mockumentary style  like the office  of wade constantly breaking the fourth wall like in the comic book it was hilarious and added new levels of humour it also allowed the character to comment ironically on himself and his situation and connect with the audience in a new way through that the lines themselves were funny too and the delivery excellent but the mockumentary fourth wall style turned out to be super conducive to getting viewers to connect with the character which is particularly important given his anti hero status  we forgive wade for a lot because of his brief asides to us excellent flick highly entertaining one of my favourite lines was when wade is talking about being good looking and asks do you think ryan reynolds got by on his acting method i thought that was hilarious  and then watched as the same ryan gave an excellent performance while looking like a diseased avocado well done ol boy

im only writing this review to argue with those who gave it 1 star what the f is wrong with you sure it wasnt the best movie ever made but it deserved at least a 6 and the reasons you gave were not all valid like 1 thinks hes a stand up comedian even though his jokes are not funny  thats who he is if he didnt spit out some lame and pointless jokes every ones in a while than he wouldnt have been a good now would he2 the villains intentions are not clear  yes they are as francis clearly states that they were going to give wade super xmen powers and create the version from wolverine origins so brainwash and use him however they want to3 women worship bs  of coarse the chick had to save the day the movie was released on valentines day and a ton of girlfriends were forced to watch the movie at the theaters or secretly wanted anyway because of ryan reynolds 4 for whoever said that isnt funny because its not quotable youre gonna die in 5 minutes pi only used an arrogant tone  swear words because its a review i actually respect your opinions and all so id like to apologize about that

vile offensive and insane with no redeeming social value at all in other words it was awesome is what happens when you take the usual superhero movie mix it with an antihero drama and then decide to make it an action comedy the movie is super meta with vile language and adult situations so this is not for the littles this is one of ryan reynolds better movies but that isnt exactly a ringing endorsement this is less a superhero movie and more a revenge fantasy that becomes a twisted love story somewhere along the way not for the faint of heart anyone with a low tolerance for vulgarity or for anyone who takes superhero movies seriously this is fun and vulgar and funny vulgar but it doesnt pretend to be anything else

so i took a look at the reviews and i found something most of the low ratings are complaining about talking too much the lack of using the budget to put more xmen in the film and the clichd and predictable plot well i have one thing to say to all of those people read a comic his character is supposed to be talking all the time making fourth wall jokes and overall being as raunchy and inappropriate as he can thats his character and it was pulled off perfectly the plot was simple but that was the point it wasnt supposed to be this deep thoughtprovoking movie this was supposed to be a fun rendition of the merc with a mouth and with the action in this film it was a great one this movie was a fun ride with plenty of jokes and a few somber moments sprinkled in there but if you dont like raunchy humor at all if youre not a fan of the main character not believing there even is a fourth wall if you dont like the way the character is supposed to be or a simple and fun movie then this isnt for you otherwise buy this movie because you will love it

of satiety when it comes to superhero movies i still had to see this new hero from the marvel stable now you didnt need much to persuade me to watch it certainly not after i saw the revealed trailer
